summary: add a standalone follower inspired by morag tong assassin in ESO Trailer
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][size=5]Fedura of Morag Tong[/size]

THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR EVERYONE FOR MAKING THIS ON HOTFILE!
[img width=641,height=390]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/83546-0-1494062973.png[/img]

add a standalone follower inspired by morag tong assassin in ESO Trailer

Name: Fedura of Morag Tong
Race: Nord Dark elf
Body: CBBE Vanilla
Voiced: Female Dark elf
Essensial: False
Marrigable: True

Class: Assassin
Stats: Levels 25 - 100
Extra: 1000 Health & Stamina
Combat Style: Assassin

Outfit: Darkelf robes
Inventory: Fedura Armor
Stats: Glass armor
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: True

Weapon: Fedura Dagger
Stats: Glass Dagger
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: True

[b][b]Location:
[/b][/b]Solstheim in The Retching Netch

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm
Dragonborn.esm[b]

[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
[/b]
